Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.jsonforms

Class JsonNodeSettingsMapperUtil

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.jsonforms.JsonNodeSettingsMapperUtil
public final class JsonNodeSettingsMapperUtil extends Object
Helper to translate json-objects (ObjectNode) into NodeSettings and vice-versa.
Author:
Marc Bux, KNIME GmbH, Berlin, Germany

  • Method Details

    • jsonObjectToNodeSettings

      public static void jsonObjectToNodeSettings(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode node, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode schemaNode, org.knime.core.node.NodeSettingsWO settings)
      Converts an arbitrary Json object node into node settings. Note that all properties (except for oneOf, anyOf, or const) in the given schema are required to have a type key. Properties of types "integer" or "number" should also provide a format key holding an OpenAPI format value ("int32" or "int64" for type "integer"; "float" or "double" for type "number").
      Parameters:
      node - the Json object node to read from
      schemaNode - the Json schema node to obtain types from
      settings - the node settings to write into

    • jsonStringToNodeSettings

      public static void jsonStringToNodeSettings(String json, String schema, org.knime.core.node.NodeSettingsWO settings)
      Parses an arbitrary JSON string and writes it into the provided NodeSettingsWO object. Note that all properties (except for oneOf, anyOf, or const) in the given schema are required to have a type key. Properties of types "integer" or "number" should also provide a format key holding an OpenAPI format value ("int32" or "int64" for type "integer"; "float" or "double" for type "number").
      Parameters:
      json - to parse and write into settings
      schema - to obtain types from
      settings - to write to

    • nodeSettingsToJsonObject

      public static void nodeSettingsToJsonObject(org.knime.core.node.NodeSettingsRO settings, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode node)
      Converts a node settings object that has previously been created via the jsonObjectToNodeSettings method into a Json object node.
      Parameters:
      settings - the node settings to read from
      node - the Json object node to write into

    • nodeSettingsToJsonString

      public static String nodeSettingsToJsonString(org.knime.core.node.NodeSettingsRO settings)
      Converts a node settings object that has previously been created via the jsonStringToNodeSettings method into a JSON string.
      Parameters:
      settings - the node settings to read from
      Returns:
      the JSON string containing the settings

    • getNestedJsonObject

      public static String getNestedJsonObject(String json, String... jsonPath)
      Extracts and returns the nested json object at the given json path.
      Parameters:
      json -
      jsonPath -
      Returns:
      the new json string representing the nested object
